resps: Lead weekly workshops on emerging frontend technologies and conduct biweekly comprehensive code reviews, resulting in improvement in student project quality.
Manage student progress using project management tools, facilitating regular 1:1 meetings via Calendly to ensure accountability, leading to an increase in course completion rates.
Collaborate with career services to evaluate student readiness for job market entry, contributing to an increase in job placement rates.
Implement and maintain a structured check-in system to monitor overall student development, proactively addressing challenges and reducing dropout rates.

Develop responsive and interactive user interfaces for complex banking applications using React and TypeScript, resulting in an increase in user engagement and a reduction in customer support tickets related to UI issues.
Utilized Mock Service Worker for robust frontend testing, improving application reliability and reducing development cycle time.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement new features and improve existing functionality, contributing to an increase in overall product satisfaction scores.
Contributed to the development of reusable component libraries, leveraging Material-UI and custom design components, which accelerated project timelines and improved code consistency across the team.

Designed and integrated charts to efficiently represent statistical data, resulting in an improvement in user comprehension of complex financial information and an increase in time spent on data analysis pages.

Implemented OAuth integration for Calendly using its API, ensuring seamless token management by utilizing refresh tokens for extended sessions beyond the initial 2-hour OAuth validity, reducing user authentication issues.

Advanced the user experience through dynamic route changes based on actions like date sorting and event history navigation, fortified by user-centric URL structuring, leading to a decrease in navigation time and an increase in user retention.
